column4: New Circle Rd at Old Paris Rd / N Limestone
column5: Injury collision reportedly involving a school bus.  The outer loop is shutdown, and the inner loop left turn lane is also blocked.  Outer loop traffic diverted to either Old Paris Rd or N Limestone.

column4: W High St at S Limestone
column5: Roadway shutdown until further notice due to a cave-in in the roadway.  All traffic on High St approaching Limestone is being diverted to Limestone.

column4: Outbound S Broadway at Mason Headley Rd
